mapper.select: select t.theme_no, t.title, t.public, t.share, t.view_cnt, h.name hashtag_name, t.category_no, c.name category_name, t.user_no owner_no, u.nickName owner_nickname from jeju_theme t left join jeju_theme_hashtag h on t.theme_no = h.theme_no left join jeju_theme_category c on t.category_no = c.category_no inner join jeju_user u on u.user_no = t.user_no order by t.theme_no

select t.theme_no, t.title, t.public, t.category_no, c.name, u.user_no owner_no, u.nickName owner_name, h.name hashtag_name from jeju_theme t inner join jeju_user u on u.user_no = t.user_no inner join jeju_theme_category c on t.category_no = c.category_no left outer join jeju_theme_hashtag h on t.theme_no = h.theme_no where title = #{title}
mapper.insert: insert into jeju_theme(title, public, share, category_no, user_no) values(#{title},#{public},#{share},#{category.no}, #{owner.no})
mapper.select: select t.theme_no, t.title, t.public, t.category_no, c.name, u.user_no owner_no, u.nickname owner_name, u.email owner_email, h.name hashtag_name from jeju_theme t inner join jeju_user u on u.user_no = t.user_no inner join jeju_theme_category c on t.category_no = c.category_no left outer join jeju_theme_hashtag h on t.theme_no = h.theme_no where h.name = #{hashtag}

select t.theme_no, t.title, t.user_no owner_no, th.name hashtag_name, lt.user_no from jeju_theme t left outer join jeju_theme_hashtag th on t.theme_no=th.theme_no left outer join jeju_liked_theme lt on t.theme_no=lt.theme_no where lt.user_no=#{no}
mapper.delete: delete from jeju_liked_theme where theme_no=#{param1} and user_no=#{param2}
